name: Time Tug
description:
Instructions:

  • Press X to begin.
  •  Arrow keys to navigate, Z to confirm, X to cancel
  • When moving: move the destination with the arrow keys, confirm with Z. You can't pass through hazards, so don't get trapped!
  •  When shooting: Up and Down arrows for quick gun rotation, and Left and Right for detailed. Confirm with Z
  • When ending a turn: Double confirm with Z.

Time tug! Freeze time every handful of moments to plan your strategy!

This game is inspired in the old school bullet hell schmups. The twist, however, is that you have a limited number of actions you can do each turn!

This game was done in 48h for the Ludum Dare competition.

Follow me on twitter for more pico-8 related posts!
